name: Keeper Registry
description: This contract defines a registry of upkeeps for Chainlink oracles.

functionDecorators.name: registerUpkeep
functionDecorators.description: Registers a new upkeep in the registry.

parameterDecorators.name: Target
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the contract that will be called when upkeep is needed.

parameterDecorators.name: Gas limit
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of gas needed to execute the upkeep.

parameterDecorators.name: Check Data
parameterDecorators.description: Data bytes with which the keeper should call checkUpkeep, if upkeep is needed. ABI-encoded fixed and specified at Upkeep registration and used in every checkUpkeep. Can be empty (0x).

returnDecorators.name: Upkeep ID
returnDecorators.description: The ID of the newly registered upkeep.

functionDecorators.name: Perform Upkeep
functionDecorators.description: Executes the upkeep with the given ID, passing in the provided performData.

parameterDecorators.name: ID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of the upkeep to be executed.

parameterDecorators.name: Perform data
parameterDecorators.description: Data to be passed to the target contract when performing the upkeep.

returnDecorators.name: Success
returnDecorators.description: Whether the upkeep was successfully performed.

functionDecorators.name: Cancel Upkeep
functionDecorators.description: Cancels the upkeep with the given ID.

parameterDecorators.name: ID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of the upkeep to be cancelled.

functionDecorators.name: Add Funds
functionDecorators.description: Adds funds to the upkeep with the given ID.

parameterDecorators.name: ID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of the upkeep to add funds to.

parameterDecorators.name: Amount
parameterDecorators.description: Quantity of LINK to add to the upkeep (specified in Juels).

functionDecorators.name: Set Upkeep Gas Limit
functionDecorators.description: Sets the gas limit for the upkeep with the given ID.

parameterDecorators.name: ID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of the upkeep to set the gas limit for.

parameterDecorators.name: Gas limit
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of gas to provide the target contract when performing upkeep.

functionDecorators.name: Get Upkeep
functionDecorators.description: Retrieves the information for an upkeep in the registry.

parameterDecorators.name: ID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the upkeep to retrieve.

returnDecorators.name: Target
returnDecorators.description: The address of the contract that will be called when upkeep is needed.

returnDecorators.name: Execute Gas
returnDecorators.description: The amount of gas needed to execute the upkeep.

returnDecorators.name: Check data
returnDecorators.description: Data bytes with which the keeper should call checkUpkeep, if upkeep is needed. ABI-encoded fixed and specified at Upkeep registration and used in every checkUpkeep. Can be empty (0x).

returnDecorators.name: Balance
returnDecorators.description: The amount of LINK available for the upkeep.

returnDecorators.name: Last Keeper
returnDecorators.description: The address of the last keeper to perform upkeep on the target contract.

returnDecorators.name: Admin
returnDecorators.description: The address of the admin of the upkeep.

returnDecorators.name: Max Valid Blocknumber
returnDecorators.description: The maximum block number that the upkeep can be performed at.

returnDecorators.name: Amount Spent
returnDecorators.description: The amount of LINK spent on the upkeep.

functionDecorators.name: Get Active Upkeep IDs
functionDecorators.description: Get a list of active upkeep IDs

parameterDecorators.name: Max Count
parameterDecorators.description: Maximum number of IDs to return

functionDecorators.name: Get Keeper Info
functionDecorators.description: Get information about a specific keeper

parameterDecorators.name: query
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the keeper to get information about

returnDecorators.name: Payee
returnDecorators.description: The address that will receive the payment for performing an upkeep.

returnDecorators.name: Active
returnDecorators.description: Is the keeper active or not.

returnDecorators.name: Balance
returnDecorators.description: The amount of LINK available for the upkeep.

functionDecorators.name: Get State
functionDecorators.description: Returns the current state of the registry and its configuration parameters.

returnDecorators.name: state
returnDecorators.description: The current state of the registry.

parameters.name: Nonce
parameters.description: The nonce used for ID generation.

parameters.name: Owner Link Balance
parameters.description: Withdrawable balance of LINK by contract owner

parameters.name: Expected Link Balance
parameters.description: The expected balance of LINK of the registry

parameters.name: Num of Upkeeps
parameters.description: Total number of upkeeps on the registry.

returnDecorators.name: Config
returnDecorators.description: The current configuration parameters of the registry.

parameters.name: Payment Premium PPB
parameters.description: The payment premium rate oracles receive on top of being reimbursed for gas, measured in parts per billion.

parameters.name: Flat Fee Micro Link
parameters.description: The flat fee paid to oracles for performing upkeeps, priced in MicroLink; can be used in conjunction with or independently of paymentPremiumPPB.

parameters.name: Block Count Per Turn
parameters.description: Number of blocks each oracle has during their turn to perform upkeep before it will be the next keeper's turn to submit

parameters.name: Check Gas Limit
parameters.description: Gas limit when checking for upkeep

parameters.name: Staleness Seconds
parameters.description: Number of seconds that is allowed for feed data to be stale before switching to the fallback pricing

parameters.name: Gas Ceiling Multiplier
parameters.description: Multiplier to apply to the fast gas feed price when calculating the payment ceiling for keepers

parameters.name: Min Upkeep Spend
parameters.description: Minimum LINK that an upkeep must spend before cancelling

parameters.name: Max Perform Gas
parameters.description: Max executeGas allowed for an upkeep on this registry

parameters.name: Fallback Gas Price
parameters.description: Gas price used if the gas price feed is stale

parameters.name: Fallback Link Price
parameters.description: LINK price used if the LINK price feed is stale

returnDecorators.name: Keeper Addresses
returnDecorators.description: The addresses of all registered keepers in the registry.
